technology.description:
Check this to deploy your generated application components on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
MDA-based SIDE allows to deploy MDA generated artefacts on main ALfresco releases.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to deploy your generated application components on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
MDA-based SIDE allows to deploy generated artefacts on Alfresco 3.x using AMP-based (Alfresco Module Package) standard packaging.

deployerVersion.description: Check this to generate a full deployable Alfresco package containing the newly generated Alfresco artifacts.

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the Alfresco Tomcat directory path in order the deployer puts the packaged war file.
This option is mandatory.
configurationParameter.label: Tomcat installation directory

option.documentation:
Check this option if you want to completely remove previous deployed packages.
May be longer but may avoid some side effects when done from time to time.
option.label: clean
